document.full_text: hurt by japan's devastating earthquake and tsunami, it vendors nec corp  and fujitsu ltd  have decided to refrain from making personnel and organizational changes, previously scheduled for april 1, the nikkei business daily reported.
document.title: nec, fujitsu to delay personnel changes: nikkei
lines_and_colors: hurt by japan's devastating earthquake and tsunami, it vendors nec corp  and fujitsu ltd  have decided to refrain from making personnel and organizational changes, previously scheduled for april 1, the nikkei business daily reported.
